text: The McLaren MP4-27 is a racing car made by Vodafone McLaren Mercedes for the 2012 Formula One Season. The chassis was designed by Paddy Lowe, Neil Oatley, Tim Gross, Andrew Bailey and Simon Lacey. It has a Mercedes-Benz engine. It was driven by former World Champion Jenson Button and Lewis Hamilton. It launched on 1 February at the McLaren team base in Woking, Surrey. Category:Formula One Category:Automobiles
title: McLaren MP4-27
